title: 1000th win, confusion?
body:
I'm fairly close to my 1000th win, but which number do i use to tell? 
my profile says i have won 979 but the post game stats say i have won 900
am I 100 wins away or 21? i don't wanna miss it.

replies.body: The number on your profile is the total number of wins regardless of map/mode. The post match number shows your win/loss for that particular map. That means you have got 79 wins in either 3v3 or ranked or co op vs Ai. Your total wins is still 979. Hope that helps :)
thanks that is a major help!
